勒索软件周 - 2023 年 12 月 15 日 - 勒索软件大戏https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/the-week-in-ransomware-december-15th-2023-ransomware-drama/ Fri, 15 Dec 2023 16:18:41 -0500劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/the-week-in-ransomware-december-15th-2023-ransomware-drama/ The big news over the past two weeks is the continued drama plaguing BlackCat/ALPHV after their infrastructure suddenly stopped working for almost five days. Multiple sources told BleepingComputer that this outage was related to a law enforcement operation, but BlackCat claims the outages were caused by a hardware/hosting issue. [...]
